text: Khawa jarra enru, kei'n nangnidiang karil khachu Pathian chongkachoi, mi kasing, halli ocha ngaikha kajuotirsik eii; inmani lekkhat kha nangni'n ningthatsik eii, lekkhat in cross ah, halli inmani lekkhat ngaikhan nangni Synagogue ngaikhan enmeel kase ah ningwuoksik eii, halli khuopui ngaikhan thatnasik inmani ningpuutsik eii.
